name: Clayton
text:
A slightly longer answer is that pages can require JavaScript (AKA ECMAScript), but it's better if they don't. Use JavaScript sparingly and carefully. There's [a set of guidelines for using JavaScript on WCAG 2.0 compliant pages][1].

  [1]: http://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/client-side-script.html
